title: Lakewood Gold Coast-- FREE HEAT
posting_body: Wonderful Victorian Style brick building with seven (7) units.
Very spacious unit with two (2) large bedrooms, formal dining room, very large living room with many windows including a bay window, high ceilings,  decorative fireplace, hardwood floors.
Stove, refrigerator and on-site pay washer/dryer provided.
Many closets--large walk-in, linen closet, two (2) bedroom closets, and a storage locker in basement.
Enjoy the many amenities Lakewood has to offer--parks,  hospitals, restaurants, library.
Minutes from downtown Cleveland--bike or hike to Edgewater Beach.
Minutes from I 90, connects to I 71, I 480, I 77
FREE HEAT, FREE Hot and Cold Water.
$1200.00  per month, plus one month's security deposit.
